row.name: PCK.AUTOMIC_HPQC.PUB.INCLUDE.HPQC_XML_TO_ARRAY
row.description: Utility to convert xml to arrays

row.process:
! Reading xml file and pleace it in one AE variable :SET &HND# = PREP_PROCESS_FILE (&AGENT#, "&UC4RB_HPQC_XML_PATH#",,"COL=NONE", 'UC_LOGIN=&LOGIN#') :SET &UC4RB_HPQC_XML_CONTENT# = "" :PROCESS &HND# : SET &LINE# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND#) : SET &UC4RB_HPQC_XML_CONTENT# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_HPQC_XML_CONTENT#, &LINE#) :ENDPROCESS :CLOSE_PROCESS &HND#
:DEFINE &UC4RB_HPQC_FIELD_NAMES#, string, 500 :DEFINE &UC4RB_HPQC_FIELD_VALUES#, string, 500 :DEFINE &IDX#, unsigned
! Get to root node : SET &XMLDOCU# = XML_OPEN(STRING, &UC4RB_HPQC_XML_CONTENT#) :IF &XMLDOCU# <> "" ! Get to Fields : SET &FIELDSHND# = XML_GET_FIRST_CHILD(&XMLDOCU#) : IF &FIELDSHND# <> "" ! Get to Field : SET &FIELDHND# = XML_GET_FIRST_CHILD(&FIELDSHND#) : SET &IDX# = 1
: WHILE &FIELDHND# <> "" !Retrieve field Name : SET &NAME# = XML_GET_ATTRIBUTE(&FIELDHND#,@Name) : SET &UC4RB_HPQC_FIELD_NAMES#[&IDX#] = &NAME# !Retrieve field value : SET &HND# = XML_GET_FIRST_CHILD(&FIELDHND#) : IF &HND# <> "" : SET &TXT# = XML_GET_NODE_TEXT(&HND#) : SET &UC4RB_HPQC_FIELD_VALUES#[&IDX#] = &TXT# : ENDIF : SET &IDX# = &IDX# + 1 : IF &IDX# > 500 : SET &FIELDHND# = "" : ELSE : SET &FIELDHND# = XML_GET_NEXTSIBLING(&FIELDHND#) : ENDIF :ENDWHILE : ENDIF : ENDIF
:XML_CLOSE
: PUBLISH &UC4RB_HPQC_FIELD_NAMES#[],,"TOP" : PUBLISH &UC4RB_HPQC_FIELD_VALUES#[] ,,"TOP"
